alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Frontier; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 3:54PM CST until January 01 at 6:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 29 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle, southwest and west central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Saturday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Deuel; Frontier; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; Perkins
